text: Strawberry Shortcake Berry Bitty Adventures is a 2010 British English and Canadian 3D animated 1 year little girl children's animation preschool television series. It was Co-Produced by Nickelodeon UK (Season 1 A paramount Viacom Company and Aired On Nick Jr. Tiny pop Csc media group Category:2010s American animated television series
title: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures
